company_context: Finally, AI for the entire software lifecycle. See how agentic AI transforms software delivery Watch GitLab Transcend now Finally, AI for the entire software lifecycle. Your intelligent orchestration platform for DevSecOps Email address Get started Built for how you work Join the 50+ million people already using GitLab. Try for free Define how teams and AI agents work together Customize your workflows for development, testing, security, and deployment. Teams orchestrate from above the software lifecycle while AI agents execute within it, automating repetitive tasks based on the rules and guardrails you set. Your agents turn issues into merge requests, remediate vulnerabilities, and review code — your team remains in control. Meet GitLab Duo Agent Platform Your end-to-end DevOps process in one place From planning to source code management to CI/CD, everything you need to build and ship software faster in one platform. All your data — projects, releases, code — in a single data plane, so your team and agents can work from one source of truth. Explore our Platform Be proactive with security built in, not bolted on Build secure products with fewer security products. Consolidate scanners like SAST, SCA, Secret Detection, and DAST into one platform. Security findings appear directly in merge requests and IDEs. Apply controls for compliance and collect audit-ready evidence automatically in every pipeline. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, I'm calling from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their software delivery. I came across your company and noticed you're using GitLab for your DevSecOps. How's your experience been with their platform so far?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Honestly, it's been a mixed bag. We like the idea of having an end-to-end DevOps process in one place, but we're still struggling with data processing and integration. What makes DeepData AI think they can help us with that?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's exactly where we come in. Our AI-powered solution can help you streamline your data processing, reducing the time and effort spent on manual tasks. We've seen great success with similar companies in the industry. I'd love to show you a demo and explore how we can help. Would you be open to a meeting next week?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure. We're in the middle of a big project right now, and I'm not convinced that your solution is worth the potential disruption. Plus, I've heard that your pricing is pretty steep. Can you tell me more about your costs and how you compare to other solutions on the market?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns. Our pricing is competitive, and we offer customized plans to fit each company's specific needs. As for disruption, our solution is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing tools, including GitLab. We've had great success with other companies in the industry, and I'd be happy to provide some case studies. Can I send you some information and follow up with a call next week to discuss further?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Look, I appreciate the pitch, but I'm just not convinced that we need another tool right now. We're trying to simplify our tech stack, not add more complexity. And to be honest, I'm not the right person to be making this decision anyway. Our CIO is the one who handles those kinds of purchases.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand. Can I ask, would it be possible to get an introduction to your CIO or someone on their team? I'd be happy to set up a call to discuss how DeepData AI can help your company. Alternatively, if you're not interested at all, I can respect that and close out this opportunity.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: No, I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. We've got too much on our plate, and like I said, we're trying to simplify our tech stack. I appreciate the follow-up, but I think we're going to have to decline your offer.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have asked about the decision-making process and identified the key stakeholders earlier in the conversation to potentially bypass the initial contact and directly engage with the CIO. Sentiment: Neutral
